name: Dinari BTCO
description: The Dinari BTCO dShares token (BTCO.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the Fidelity Advantage Bitcoin ETF (BTCO), a regulated financial product providing institutional-grade exposure to Bitcoin. Each BTCO.d token is fully backed by a corresponding share of the BTCO ETF securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, BTCO.d enables fractional ownership, 24/7 trading, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, providing a secure and efficient way to gain Bitcoin exposure through a trusted ETF.
